distribution_strategy: The document is divided into two parts. SubMaster 1 focuses on the initial sections (Abstract and Introduction) to provide a high-level overview and background. SubMaster 2 handles the remaining sections (Related Work and Methodology_Results) to delve into the literature review and experimental details. This division allows for a logical flow of information, starting with the general context and progressing to the specific methods and results.

submasters.role: Summarize Abstract and Introduction, focusing on key concepts and contributions.
Extract key methodologies, findings, and keywords from Related Work and Methodology_Results sections.
